title: Sona ultimate Skin confirmed????
body:
The 3 songs I'm assuming are for the ability's

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04FFUHNYvVo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7yfS-Um1dfM

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D9rbVnE1cNM

replies.body:
Its kind of a bad decision considering she's a champion who lacks so much 'diversity' in theme...

I mean, PFE you get an armour suit which would Level Up as you do,
SGU you get 4 themes for 4 animal abilities which all can evolve,

DJS you get different EDM music???



Unless DJ Sona has some crazyass animation developments or audio FX (which not everyone turns on anyway) then maybe it has a chance of matching other ultimate skins...

I'm still thinking it's Legendary...(or whatever the 1820s are called)

> [{quoted}](name=Strider Hiryu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K7mqTreb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-31T05:36:13.310+0000)
>
> Its kind of a bad decision considering she's a champion who lacks so much 'diversity' in theme...
> 
> I mean, PFE you get an armour suit which would Level Up as you do,
> SGU you get 4 themes for 4 animal abilities which all can evolve,
> 
> DJS you get different EDM music???
> 
> 
> 
> Unless DJ Sona has some crazyass animation developments or audio FX (which not everyone turns on anyway) then maybe it has a chance of matching other ultimate skins...
> 
> I'm still thinking it's Legendary...(or whatever the 1820s are called)

I think it's a bad decision to base the "diversity" of the Sona skin on 3 music videos. If this was just a simple legendary skin, it would have not taken them so much time to make.
DJ Sona has been confirmed for a long time.
oh really? cool i just found out so i thought i would share. :)
